Writer: Paul Rudnick (characters), James Orr, Jim Cruickshank, Judi Ann Mason
Title: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit
Plot: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.
Actors: Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Najimy, Barnard Hughes, Mary Wickes
